description.value: This character was born naturally as opposed to the disgusting wretches born through Amniotic Tanks and Vitae Wombs. The Character can purchase Fellowship Advances at a rate of (1st 100xp, 2nd 250xp, 3rd 500xp, 4th 1000xp) This Talent can only be purchased at character creation, and never afterwards.
